gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 125, Wizards 109
gameRecap.excerpt: Kawhi Leonard led the Clippers with 31 points, nine rebounds, and four assists as the Clippers defeated the Wizards, 125-109. James Harden (25 points, five 3PT, nine rebounds, five assists) and Norman Powell (14 points, seven rebounds, three assists) added 39 points in the win. Kyle Kuzma led the Wizards with 27 points while Bilal Coulibaly added 19 points, four rebounds, and two blocks. The Clippers improve to 31-15 overall as they finish 12-3 in January, while the Wizards move to 9-38.
